title: Legon Awakening
description: Join Legon and his sister, Sasha, as they search to understand their true heritage and unravel the possibility of being part human and part elf. Surrounded by Elves, the newly introduced Iumenta race, Dragons and Humans, our heroes' lives are filled with adventure and fantasy in their search for answers, as they begin a larger-than-life quest of discovery.
author: Nicholas    Taylor
